verses.verse: And the fifth<WG3991> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and I saw<WG3708> a star<WG792> from heaven<WG3772> which had fallen<WG4098> to the earth;<WG1093> and the key<WG2807> of the bottomless<WG12> pit<WG5421> was given<WG1325> to him.

And he opened<WG455> the bottomless<WG12> pit;<WG5421> and smoke<WG2586> went<WG305> up out of the pit,<WG5421> like<WG5613> the smoke<WG2586> of a great<WG3173> furnace;<WG2575> and the sun<WG2246> and the air<WG109> were darkened<WG4656> by the smoke<WG2586> of the pit.<WG5421>

And out of the smoke<WG2586> came<WG1831> forth<WG1831> locusts<WG200> upon the earth;<WG1093> and power<WG1849> was given<WG1325> them, as the scorpions<WG4651> of the earth<WG1093> have<WG2192> power.<WG1849>

And they were told<WG3004> that they should not hurt<WG91> the grass<WG5528> of the earth,<WG1093> nor<WG3761> any<WG3956> green<WG5515> thing,<WG5515> nor<WG3761> any<WG3956> tree,<WG1186> but only<WG1487> <WG3361> the men<WG444> who<WG3748> do not have<WG2192> the seal<WG4973> of God<WG2316> on their foreheads.<WG3359>

And they were not permitted<WG1325> to kill<WG615> anyone,<WG846> but to torment<WG928> for five<WG4002> months;<WG3376> and their torment<WG929> was like<WG5613> the torment<WG929> of a scorpion<WG4651> when<WG3752> it stings<WG3817> a man.<WG444>
And in those<WG1565> days<WG2250> men<WG444> will seek<WG2212> death<WG2288> and will not find<WG2147> it; and they will long<WG1937> to die<WG599> and death<WG2288> flees<WG5343> from them.

And the appearance<WG3667> of the locusts<WG200> was like<WG3664> horses<WG2462> prepared<WG2090> for battle;<WG4171> and on their heads,<WG2776> as it were, crowns<WG4735> like<WG3664> gold,<WG5557> and their faces<WG4383> were like<WG5613> the faces<WG4383> of men.<WG444>
And they had<WG2192> hair<WG2359> like<WG5613> the hair<WG2359> of women,<WG1135> and their teeth<WG3599> were like<WG5613> [the teeth] of lions.<WG3023>

And they had<WG2192> breastplates<WG2382> like<WG5613> breastplates<WG2382> of iron;<WG4603> and the sound<WG5456> of their wings<WG4420> was like<WG5613> the sound<WG5456> of chariots,<WG716> of many<WG4183> horses<WG2462> rushing<WG5143> to battle.<WG4171>
And they have<WG2192> tails<WG3769> like<WG3664> scorpions,<WG4651> and stings;<WG2759> and in their tails<WG3769> is their power<WG1849> to hurt<WG91> men<WG444> for five<WG4002> months.<WG3376>

They have<WG2192> as king<WG935> over<WG1909> them, the angel<WG32> of the abyss;<WG12> his name<WG3686> in Hebrew<WG1447> is Abaddon, and in the Greek<WG3> he has<WG1673> the name<WG2192> Apollyon.<WG3686>
The first<WG1520> woe<WG3759> is past;<WG565> behold,<WG2400> two<WG1417> woes<WG3759> are still<WG2089> coming<WG2064> after<WG3326> these<WG3778> things.<WG3778>
And the sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> sounded,<WG4537> and I heard<WG191> a voice<WG5456> from the four<WG5064> horns<WG2768> of the golden<WG5552> altar<WG2379> which is before<WG1799> God,<WG2316>

one saying<WG3004> to the sixth<WG1623> angel<WG32> who had<WG2192> the trumpet,<WG4536> "Release<WG3089> the four<WG5064> angels<WG32> who are bound<WG1210> at the great<WG3173> river<WG4215> Euphrates.<WG2166>"

And the four<WG5064> angels,<WG32> who had been prepared<WG2090> for the hour<WG5610> and day<WG2250> and month<WG3376> and year,<WG1763> were released,<WG3089> so<WG2443> that they might kill<WG615> a third<WG5154> of mankind.<WG444>
And the number<WG706> of the armies<WG4753> of the horsemen<WG2461> was two<WG7046> <WG3461> hundred<WG7046> <WG3461> million<WG7046>;<WG3461> I heard<WG191> the number<WG706> of them.

And this<WG3779> is how<WG3779> I saw<WG3708> in the vision<WG3706> the horses<WG2462> and those<WG3588> who sat<WG2521> on them: [the riders] had<WG2192> breastplates<WG2382> [the color] of fire<WG4447> and of hyacinth<WG5191> and of brimstone;<WG2306> and the heads<WG2776> of the horses<WG2462> are like<WG5613> the heads<WG2776> of lions;<WG3023> and out of their mouths<WG4750> proceed<WG1607> fire<WG4442> and smoke<WG2586> and brimstone.<WG2303>

A third<WG5154> of mankind<WG444> was killed<WG615> by these<WG3778> three<WG5140> plagues,<WG4127> by the fire<WG4442> and the smoke<WG2586> and the brimstone,<WG2303> which proceeded<WG1607> out of their mouths.<WG4750>

For the power<WG1849> of the horses<WG2462> is in their mouths<WG4750> and in their tails;<WG3769> for their tails<WG3769> are like<WG3664> serpents<WG3789> and have<WG2192> heads;<WG2776> and with them they do<WG91> harm.<WG91>

And the rest<WG3062> of mankind,<WG444> who<WG3739> were not killed<WG615> by these<WG3778> plagues,<WG4127> did not repent<WG3340> of the works<WG2041> of their hands,<WG5495> so<WG2443> as not to worship<WG4352> demons,<WG1140> and the idols<WG1497> of gold<WG5552> and of silver<WG693> and of brass<WG5470> and of stone<WG3035> and of wood,<WG3585> which<WG3739> can<WG1410> neither<WG3777> see<WG991> nor<WG3777> hear<WG191> nor<WG3777> walk;<WG4043>
and they did not repent<WG3340> of their murders<WG5408> nor<WG3777> of their sorceries<WG5331> nor<WG3777> of their immorality<WG4202> nor<WG3777> of their thefts.<WG2809>
